013    package net.sf.oval.constraint;
014    
015    import static net.sf.oval.Validator.getCollectionFactory;
016    
017    import java.util.Map;
018    
019    import net.sf.oval.Validator;
020    import net.sf.oval.configuration.annotation.AbstractAnnotationCheck;
021    import net.sf.oval.context.OValContext;
022    import net.sf.oval.exception.ExpressionEvaluationException;
023    import net.sf.oval.exception.ExpressionLanguageNotAvailableException;
024    import net.sf.oval.expression.ExpressionLanguage;
025    
026    /**
027     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
028     */
029    public class AssertCheck extends AbstractAnnotationCheck<Assert>
030    {
031            private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
032    
033            private String lang;
034            private String expr;
035    
036            /**
037             * {@inheritDoc}
038             */
039            @Override
040            public void configure(final Assert constraintAnnotation)
041            {
042                    super.configure(constraintAnnotation);
043                    setExpr(constraintAnnotation.expr());
044                    setLang(constraintAnnotation.lang());
045            }
046    
047            /**
048             * @return the expression
049             */
050            public String getExpr()
051            {
052                    return expr;
053            }
054    
055            /**
056             * @return the expression language
057             */
058            public String getLang()
059            {
060                    return lang;
061            }
062    
063            /**
064             * {@inheritDoc}
065             */
066            public boolean isSatisfied(final Object validatedObject, final Object valueToValidate, final OValContext context,
067                            final Validator validator) throws ExpressionEvaluationException, ExpressionLanguageNotAvailableException
068            {
069                    final Map<String, Object> values = getCollectionFactory().createMap();
070                    values.put("_value", valueToValidate);
071                    values.put("_this", validatedObject);
072    
073                    final ExpressionLanguage el = validator.getExpressionLanguage(lang);
074                    return el.evaluateAsBoolean(expr, values);
075            }
076    
077            /**
078             * @param expression the expression to set
079             */
080            public void setExpr(final String expression)
081            {
082                    expr = expression;
083                    requireMessageVariablesRecreation();
084            }
085    
086            /**
087             * @param language the expression language to set
088             */
089            public void setLang(final String language)
090            {
091                    lang = language;
092                    requireMessageVariablesRecreation();
093            }
094    
095            /**
096             * {@inheritDoc}
097             */
098            @Override
099            public Map<String, String> createMessageVariables()
100            {
101                    final Map<String, String> messageVariables = getCollectionFactory().createMap(2);
102                    messageVariables.put("expression", expr);
103                    messageVariables.put("language", lang);
104                    return messageVariables;
105            }
106    
107    }
